TopicTitle: Fail to create a Sat Network

Articles.Content:
Let me tell you a story...

Rocket built with a 9 Sat drop system. One Relai Sat at the top and 8 small ones in the cargo bay. Everything controlled by a remote control module...

At all satellites the control units and the antennas etc. all deactivated, only the control unit of the rocket was activated. Gravity turn impossible because the SAS is completely spinning around. I still managed to get into orbit somehow. Then on 1000 KM orbit gflogen all satellites gedropt and then the mission was over because the game is completely durchgedreht.

So you can not build a network of satellites when the whole game turns hollow at once. The satellites were then in some orbit just not where they should be, some wanted to leave the solar system and the remote-controlled rocket was no longer controllable and has then simply disassembled itself so 200 KM before re-entry ... without my doing... yes great mission.

SAS spins, physics spins, everything bugs around. The game is not playable in this state.

[snip]
